messages.subject: GED prep book
messages.msgSnippet: Princeton Review has great resources for this type of thing. Barb
messages.messageBody:
Princeton Review has great resources for this type of thing.
Barb

messages.subject: Re: GED prep book
messages.msgSnippet: ... I saw some of these at our local Sam s Club Warehouse.  There was also some GED prep software available. Your local library should also have some GED prep
messages.messageBody:
> From: rick and deborah farrington <honeybee@...>
>
> i want to buy a GED prep book. do any of you know of a good one?
> my son wants to go to a pilot school. he can take the ged at 16 then
> start the first year classes so there after. we have year to prepare.
> (a pilot school as in flying airplanes)

I saw some of these at our local Sam's Club Warehouse. There was also some
GED prep software available. Your local library should also have some GED
prep books that can be checked out for free. You also might check into what
opportunities exist for him with the Civil Air Patrol....

Enjoy your day,

Monica L. Molinar

messages.messageBody:
i want to buy a GED prep book. do any of you know of a good one?
my son wants to go to a pilot school. he can take the ged at 16 then
start the first year classes so there after. we have year to prepare.
(a pilot school as in flying airplanes)
